Description: Menu Other Items Feedbacks About Us Contact Us Add To Favorites --> --> Concealed Carry Crossbody Satchel with Matching Wallet by Montana West (Black) Product Summary: This stylish concealed carry crossbody satchel by Montana West is made from high quality PU leather. The front of the purse is crafted with a cut-out tribal pattern with matching color inlay. It is further adorned with embroidered floral, antique rivets and crystal studs. The flap of this satchel features two tassels and dual magnetic closure. The main zippered compartment is divided into two parts by a full-length zippered pocket with 2 open pockets on one side and another secure zippered pocket on the other. With dual carry options, one has the choice to use the carry handle or the adjustable shoulder strap for crossbody use. The adjustable crossbody strap easily clips on and off and measures 42" - 48". The single handle measures 7 " long with a 1.5" drop. Other features include quality hardware, an open pocket on the back and metal feet on the bottom. The lovely matching wallet has the same cut-out tribal pattern with matching color inlay. Embroidered floral , antique rivets and crystal studs also adorn the front of this wallet. A single snap secures the front flap. The interior has 9 card slots and 2 long slot compartments for your bills and other necessities. A twist snap opens the back dual coin compartment. Concealment Pocket Specifications: The separate concealed carry compartment is located on the back and has a right vertical access. It measures 9.5" W x 5.5" H and easily stores large framed handguns. This patent protected design doesn't require a holster. The pocket is in the shape of a gun which allows for a quick release because the barrel is supported and the gun doesn't tilt downward. Purse Dimensions: 13" x 4" x 10" (Handle 7" L Drop - 1.5") (Adjustable strap 42"- 48") Wallet Dimensions: 7.5" x 4.5" Item Specification Sturdy handles leave ample room for convenient hanging when not in use. --> Medium large satchel constructed with PU Leather / cut-out tribal pattern with matching color inlay / embroidered floral with antique rivets and crystal studs / flap with tassels and magnetic closureMain zippered enclosure divided into two parts by a full length zippered pocket / small zippered pocket on one side and 2 open pockets on the otherConcealment pocket measures 9.5" W x 5.5" H / right vertical access / patent protected design/ doesn't require a holsterMatching wallet has multiple credit card slots, two bill pockets, a spilt coin pocket on the back with twist snap closurePurse Dimensions: 13" x 4" x 10" (Handle 7" L Drop - 1.5") (Adjustable strap 42"- 48") / Wallet Dimensions: 7.5" x 4.5" -->--> Video-->Dimensions Shipping Returns Additional Info --> Product Dimensions: Package Dimensions: Fast shipping is very important for us.
